protein.specific_function: Core subunit of the mitochondrial membrane respiratory chain NADH dehydrogenase (Complex I) that is believed to belong to the minimal assembly required for catalysis. Complex I functions in the transfer of electrons from NADH to the respiratory chain. The immediate electron acceptor for the enzyme is believed to be ubiquinone (By similarity).

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on nadh or nadph
generation of precursor metabolites and energy
mitochondrial electron transport, nadh to ubiquinone
mitochondrial electron transport, NADH to ubiquinone
